post:
[VPSNINE](https://www.vpsnine.com) is a virtualization company
specializing in linux VPS Hosting. Offering high quality VPS's with
professional support.

Currently offering 30% off with promo code LET0516A for the following
locations: Singapore, Hong Kong, Auckland New Zealand, Cape Town South
Africa, New York City USA , Germany and Zurich Switzerland.

Host your Singapore VPS with us and enjoy the best possible
reliability, speeds and peering in the Asian region. We host our
services at Internap, one of the best connected data centeres in
Singapore. Internap provides optimized routes to Southeast Asia,
Australia and China and have preferred interconnection options with
Equinix, Keppel Digihub, KDDI and GlobalSwitch.

For NYC we are located in the same data center building as Google New York.

In New Zealand we are located at "The Data Center", one of the best
and most connected data centers in Auckland.

Use our locations tool to check out our great connectivity world wide.

Custom OpenVZ VPS from $7 with our 30% discount code LET0516A
256MB RAM, 30GB Disk, 400GB Bandwidth, 1 Core
[Order Now](https://www.vpsnine.com/forms/form0.php?pid=46)

For more details on our locations see
[https://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/locations.php](https://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/locations.php)

Pay via Paypal, BitCoin, Skrill, Perfect Money, OKPay or Payza

**14 Day Moneyback Guarantee**
If your unhappy with our service for any reason at all within 14 days
we'll refund your money! No questions asked. Just log a billing ticket
requesting a refund with a breif reason just so we know what we did
wrog.

**TESTS:**
See our location pages https://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/locations.php


**Contact us :**
